TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .
On DATE the applicant lodged an action against ORG ( ORG ) with ORG , seeking compensation for damage to his health during his service .

On DATE ORG ruled in favour of the applicant and ordered the Ministry to pay him CARDINAL Moldovan lei ( MDL ) ( the equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) as of DATE ) . The Ministry did not appeal and after DATE the judgment became final and enforceable .

On DATE the applicant complained about the non - enforcement of the judgment in his favour to a bailiff . On DATE the latter informed the applicant , inter alia , that the enforcement warrant had been sent to ORG on DATE and it could not be enforced due to lack of money .
On DATE the applicant brought a new action against ORG , seeking compensation for inflation for the period of non - enforcement .
During the proceedings , on DATE , the ORG complied with the judgment of CARDINAL DATE and paid the applicant MDL CARDINAL .

On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant ’s action . It found , inter alia , that since the judgment in his favour had been enforced , the ORG could not be made subject to an additional obligation to pay him compensation . He appealed against it .
On DATE the ORG dismissed the applicant ’s appeal . He did not lodge an appeal on points of law with ORG .
The relevant domestic law was set out in GPE and Others v. GPE , nos . CARDINAL , CARDINAL , ORG , CARDINAL/CARDINAL , CARDINAL/CARDINAL and GPE , § CARDINAL , DATE .
